title: How to turn off El Capitan’s ‘shake to find’ mouse cursor feature
text:
How to turn off El Capitan’s ‘shake to find’ mouse cursor feature 
Published By: CultOfMac.com - Today 
When I lose track of my mouse cursor, I’ve always just wiggled it a bit to find it on the screen. It’s a natural gesture, and Apple’s ...
